H0.text: Friction is needed to make the bell ring when students attempt to make a doorbell ring using wire and a battery.

H1.text: Gravity is needed to make the bell ring when students are attempting to make a doorbell ring using some wire and a battery.

H2.text: A convection current is needed to make the bell ring when students are attempting to make a doorbell ring using some wire and a battery.

H3.text: An electrical circuit is needed to make the bell ring when students are attempting to use some wire and a battery.

A4.text: An electrical circuit is a network consisting of a closed loop, giving a return path for the current.
